threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

attributes.magic: Bourne-Again shell script, ASCII text executable, with very long lines (985u)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Execution Of Script Located In Potentially Suspicious Directory
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects executions of scripts located in potentially suspicious locations such as "/tmp" via a shell such as "bash", "sh", etc.

match_context.values:
@{CommandLine=/usr/bin/bash bash -c "#!/bin/bash
osascript -e 'on run
    try
        set volumeList to list disks
    end try
    set setupVolume to ""
    try
        repeat with vol in volumeList
            if vol contains "DeepSeek" then
                set setupVolume to vol
                exit repeat
            end if
        end repeat
    end try
    if setupVolume is "" then
        return
    end if
    set scriptDir to "/Volumes/" & setupVolume & "/"
    set executabl [TRUNCATED]; Image=/usr/bin/bash; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects execution of AppleScript of the macOS scripting language AppleScript.

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=/usr/bin/osascript osascript -e on run    try        set volumeList to list disks    end try    set setupVolume to ''    try        repeat with vol in volumeList            if vol contains 'DeepSeek' then                set setupVolume to vol                exit repeat            end if        end repeat    end try    if setupVolume is '' then        return    end if    set scriptDir to '/Volumes/' & setupVolume & '/'    set executableName to '.DeepSeek'    set executablePath to scriptDir & exec [TRUNCATED]; Image=/usr/bin/osascript; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects usage of base64 utility to decode arbitrary base64-encoded text
Detects usage of base64 utility to decode arbitrary base64-encoded text
